name: TOYBOX (itch) (HunterMcSteegs)
description:
- WELCOME HOME ! -

Darkness. That's the only thing you can see for a few moments. Maybe it should be peaceful, but your stomach rolls and crashes against your ribs like violent waves. The first specks of color that dot your vision are red, blue, yellow. Then there's green, and orange, and so on.

It should just feel like a dream.

It doesn't.

It doesn't, because you're waking up somewhere adjacent to your childhood. Somewhere still too faraway from home to cure the homesickness fluttering in your gut. This is a place that used to be a safe space from the world that beat you down, but n̵o̵w̷...

...

Waking up in a familiar room has never been so... so AWESOME! Come on and join the fun in TOYBOX, a game where you can solve puzzles and catch up with old friends from your w-wonderful and loving childhood. 

It's the good ol' days all over again. Just make sure you don't leave, and everything will be just fine.

- CONTROLS ! -

WASD to Move

F to Interact

Spacebar to Jump

Left Mouse Button to Force Push
